DOC.brief_summary: Phase 1 single IV dose study to evaluate safety and tolerability of MEDI4920
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1, Randomized, Blinded, Placebo-controlled, Single-ascending Dose Study to Evaluate the Safety and Tolerability of MEDI4920 in Healthy Adults
DOC.criteria: Healthy as determined by a responsible study physician based on medical evaluation Body weight 40 to 100 kg Body mass index 19.0 to 30.0 kg/m2 History of allergy or sensitivity to Shellfish or protein based antigens previous immunization with KLH previous splenectomy History of diagnosed or suspected thromboembolic event or coagulation disorder
DOC.keyword: Healthy Female of non child bearing potential
